content: this legal text describes the progress of a court case in tartu county court the court issued a final resolution after a year and two months the case involved two parties referred to as ra and mh the resolution accepted ras partial waiver of their claim for compensation for funeral expenses and partially settled their claim the court terminated the joint ownership of an apartment property through an electronic auction with a starting price of 90000 euros the court also ordered the division of the inheritance and the transfer of a sum of money to a bank account mh was ordered to pay a certain amount to ra for a specific period both parties are responsible for bearing the costs of the proceedings the decision was delivered to the parties and there is a possibility to appeal within a certain timeframe the court examined the evidence and arguments presented by both parties and made decisions based on applicable laws and regulations the court resolved various issues and disputes between the parties and provided a final decision on each matter the text also mentioned another legal case where party a requested the keys to an apartment from party b the court found that party b unjustifiably refused to hand over the keys and awarded party a the right to use the apartment for a specific period the court also determined that the procedural costs should be divided equally between the parties the summary of the text includes the steps of the court case such as the complaint response hearing decision judgment communication of the judgment right to appeal review by a higher court and final compliance with the courts decision
